Package com.varukha.webproject.model.dao

Interface InvoiceDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
InvoiceDAOImpl
public interface InvoiceDAO
Interface InvoiceDAO contain contracts of methods for interacting with the MySQL Database.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Dmytro Varukha

  • Method Details

    • createInvoice

      Invoice createInvoice(ResultSet resultSet) throws SQLException
      Method createInvoice used to create set of invoice data with all information about user order.
      Parameters:
      resultSet - set of data about user order from database.
      Returns:
      invoice information from database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - is an exception that provides information on a database access error or other errors.

    • addInvoice

      boolean addInvoice(Invoice invoice) throws DAOException
      Method addInvoice used to adding new invoice to database.
      Parameters:
      invoice - contain a set of data that will be added to database.
      Returns:
      boolean result of operation. Return true if new invoice was added and false if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.

    • updateInvoiceData

      boolean updateInvoiceData(Invoice data) throws DAOException, SQLException
      Method updateInvoiceData used to updating invoice data.
      Parameters:
      data - contain a set of data to change invoice.
      Returns:
      boolean result of operation. Return true if update was successful and false if was not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.
      SQLException

    • findInvoiceById

      Optional<Invoice> findInvoiceById(long invoiceId) throws DAOException
      Method findInvoiceById used to find invoice by invoice id.
      Parameters:
      invoiceId - invoice id in which the search is performed.
      Returns:
      optional result of operation. Return optional of invoice if available and return empty if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.

      Parameters:
      deliveryDate - date in which the search is performed.
      Returns:
      optional result of operation. Return optional of invoices if available and return empty if not.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.

    • findInvoiceByDestinationCity

      Method findInvoiceByDestinationCity used to find all invoice by sender city and recipient city.
      Parameters:
      firstCity - sender citi city in which the search is performed.
      secondCity - receiver city in which the search is performed.
      Returns:
      list of invoices by searching first city and second city.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.

      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException.
